title: Designer
content:
Overview

Develop or trans create digital graphic assets which will be exposed in Japan market for global FMCG client, based on their brand guideline and key creative materials 
Work with Digital Creators & Writers to conceptualize work initiated by them directly or indirectly. 


Candidates to create impactful design using their essential design capabilities, digital know-how and details, based on an understanding of the brand guidelines. 
The service is made essentially in on-site studio of client office in Tokyo 

Accountabilities/Core Duties

Translate ideas into sketches, wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes. 
Test assets and optimize based on their performance. 
Create digital assets (static, video, and HTML) for a range of platforms (social, display advertising, eCommerce, websites, mobile apps, etc.). 
Design and develop homepages, landing pages, and email concepts. 


Experience with stock image libraries and image processing that make up campaign assets 
Support multiple productions in parallel if needed 
Fluent in digital language to be able to communicate with clients, agencies and partner companies as needed 
An accurate record keeper, able to provide accurate time tracking reports. Has basic etiquette as a member of society (loose in time, mistaken invoice, etc. are out of the question) 

 
Qualifications

Experience in the design thinking process, agile development, and lean startup methodologies. 


Expertise with standard digital design tools, including Figma, Adobe CS in a MAC environment 
Working knowledge of CSS and HTML/5 
Strong knowledge of current digital design best practices and web production techniques. 
Experience with user-centered design, rapid prototyping, and user testing. 
Experience creating digital assets for a variety of target audiences and touchpoints. 


Origination, adaptation, resizing, producing, and delivering a variety of online creative content. Examples: online banners, eDM, storyboards and site (content) designs, videos 
Quickly translate ideas into sketches, wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes. 
Collaborate with creators and writers and project managers to provide high quality and prompt deliverables. 
Work experience with a global brand with strict brand guidelines and knowledge in local regulation is a plus

Who you are

Has an honest, cheerful personality with a positive attitude to contribute as a member of the team. 
Those who can demonstrate flexible initiatives in every situation 
Good time management habits, follow agreed deadlines 
Self-starting, proactive and prepared to put in the hard yards to deliver excellent creative output 
Follow the latest production trends and able to adopt and propose best practices as needed 

 
Language Requirement
Minimum Conversational English (for native Japanese) 
 


At Ogilvy, our people are at the heart of what we do: a creative agency that sparks game-changing ideas across culture and business through collaboration, integrity, and a celebration of self-expression. 
We believe in building powerful teams with purpose. This means hiring and nurturing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientation, and gender identities â€“ and we relentlessly curate transformative initiatives that make our commitment to fairness, and equity a reality. 
Our ultimate mission is to leave a positive impact on the world, creating a better future for all, while supporting and uplifting the global communities we serve.  This is central to our mantra of Borderless Creativity.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.
